values:
I am very busy lately.  It's good, but every once in a while, I let it fill me up so much that I feel overwhelmed.

I had a crazy dream.  I won't go into extreme detail, but the kicker is that an evil man that Wiggy and I were chasing attacked Wiggy with a hammer, severely injuring him.  I was so furious, I disarmed him and reduced him to a puddle of blood with his own hammer.  In any case, I'm protective of my puppy.

Work is going well.  I'm getting involved in more project work, which I prefer to the mundane meeting scheduling-type tasks of the typical executive assistant.

Things are whirling through my head a hundred miles an hour lately, and I can't pick out anything else to mention at the moment.  

I hope things are well with you.

-started badly with the news of the almost $2000 in repairs that would be required to get my car to pass emissions
-the sorrows were drowned in a few drinks at the AC (thanks again, H!)
-woke up too early on Saturday, birthday present shopping 
-chuck e cheese for M's 5th birthday (holy crap that place is frightening!!)
-car dealerships (2)
-car deal for a new to me '06 liberty!  (her name is Betty.  she is bronze.) (H- do you know cheryl mensch @ AA?)
-bad tacos at chipotle
-delirious movie discussions, country album writin', cover art ideas, and naming the villain for my young adult novel (look out J.K.!) with I and B
-grocery shopping
-early thanksgiving at N's, lost miserably at monopoly (it's really ok.)
-got "bumped" while waiting for an arrow to turn on hampden (everything looks ok, will further investigate in sunlight)
-laundry
-hemmed pants
-laundry
-xmas project research
-lame lj post
I am participating in the American Heart Association Heart Walk. Please help me beat the other people on my team. :) Thank You.
